reviews.comments: Corta pero hermosa estadía!!! El depto. super cómodo tal como se describe con una vista al parque Las Heras inmejorable!!.. Seguimos las sugerencias de Rocío & Nicolás para cenar y desayunar... disfrutamos mucho!!! El estacionamiento está a pocos metros es súper cómodo y buen precio para la zona... Palermo bello!!! Volveremos!!!
Excelente el departamento y excelente el servicio
Una vista espectacular!!!
Muy bien ubicado, el departamento es muy cómodo y agradable, con una vista muy linda a parque Las Heras, que le suma un plus muy importante.
El departamento es hermoso. La descripción perfecta. Excelente ubicación. Rocio y Nicolás unos genios!! Gracias!!!!

El departamento era tal cual se muestra en las fotografías. La ubicación para nosotros fue ideal.
Muchas gracias chicos! Cuando volvamos a Buenos Aires seguramente nos hospedemos nuevamente en su departamento.
Rocio y Nicolas son dos personas sensibles y amables.

El departmento impecable, muy limpio y bien equipado. La zona es segura y hay un estacionamiento a media cuadra que no me pareció caro por estar situado en Palermo. Nico y ro nos recomendaron un lindo lugar para desayunar y fue un lindo detalle. Ellos me respondieron rápido todos mis mensajes y con la mejor onda. Un lugar para volver! Me senti como en casa.
Rocío y Nicolás fueron muy amables, todo fue según las fotos y lo prometido. Muy luminoso y muy linda vista. 100% recomendable
Todo perfecto! El departamento es muy cómodo y se encuentra bien ubicado.
Muy buena ubicación. El departamento cómodo y limpio.
Todo excelente!

El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, la atencion fue muy rapida y buena. Pasamos una hermosa estadia, ubicados en el corazon del Barrio de Recoleta. Los recomendamos 100%. Esperamos volver algun dia!

Rocio estuvo siempre dispuesta a facilitar todo lo que necesitamos. Siempre comunicada con nosotros. También la señora Carmen es muy muy amable. Nos recibió de la mejor manera, mostrándonos todo lo que teníamos que saber sobre el edificio y sobre el departamento. Definitivamente volveremos.
Fue una muy buena estadía
Excelente ubicación , cómodo el depto y buena predisposición de los anfitriones !!!! Gracias

Hermoso departamento: muy bien equipado, súper cómodo y con una vista hermosa. Estaba todo muy limpio. Rocío y Nicolás fueron sumamente gentiles, siempre dispuestos a ayudarnos. Está muy bien ubicado, súper céntrico y en una zona espectacular.
El departamento de verdad es increíble, perfectamente decorado y con todas las comodidades que alguien que viene a trabajar o disfrutar necesita
Muchas gracias.  Hermosoooo el dpto, super equipado. Una vista única directo al parque las heras. La comunicación eficaz y fluida. Todo genial.  Sumamente recomendable!

La verdad que todo estuvo muy bien. El departamento esta perfecto y la ubicación es ideal. Lo recomendamos y seguramente mis padres a la hora de volver a estar en Buenos Aires  elijan este departamento.
Gracias por todo.

Diego

Rocío y Nicolas fueron muy amables en todo momento, tanto en la reserva como al hospedarnos. Generosos con los recursos y ricos en sus gestos, nos sentimos en casa a pesar de tratarse de una sola noche. Salud!

El barrio es bueno, el departamento está muy bien equipado y es como lo muestran las fotos. Es relativamente (URL HIDDEN) se observan detalles para quejarse o reclamar. Considerando el precio pagado la operación es altamente recomendable.
Excelente el departamento , tal cual la descripción con múltiples servicios alrededor , recomendable

El apartamento de Rocío y Nicolás es espectacular, aún mejor de lo que esperábamos, es acogedor y tiene todo lo necesario para una cómoda estadía. La vista y la tranquilidad en el apartamento es excelente y la ubicación facilita el transporte a pie, en autobús y en subterráneo, además cerca hay tiendas de comestibles y buenos restaurantes. La atención de Rocío y Nicolás fue genial, nos dieron recomendaciones que nos ayudaron mucho.
Excelente lugar, muy recomendado.

Nuestra estancia en la casa fue estupenda. Esta localizada en una zona residencial muy segura y moderna cercano a zonas de gran interés turistico y de ocio. Las vistas son espectaculares y la azotea con piscina son el final perfecto para un duro día de caminatas.  Muy recomendable.
El apartamento es bonito y en lo mejor ubicación!!

Excelente apartamento! Cómodo, accesible a lugares muy lindos para conocer...
Totalmente recomendable!
Lindo y acogedor con vista preciosa
excelente lugar. tal como se descrive. volveria totalmente

Nuestra estadía en el departamento de Rocio & Nicolas fue muy grata y amena.  El departamento es tal como lo muestran las fotos, con una vista increíble. La comunicación con Rocio & Nicolas fue excelente, siempre contestaron rapidamente cualquier inquietud. El check in era a partir de las 2pm, pero nos dejaron ingresar el cuarto a las 10:30 am mientras Carmen, la señora de limpieza, preparaba el resto del departamento. 
Además, el departamento contaba con un parlante Bose bluetooth por lo que pudimos disfrutar de nuestra música. También habían muchos libros turísticos de Argentina, que fueron muy útiles para planear nuestras actividades.
¡Muy recomendado!

El apartamento fue absolutamente fenomenal. El apartamento es limpio, y en una área bien central con restaurantes ricisimos. Felizmente me quedaría otra vez! 

Muchas gracias 

The apartment is exactly as stated. Very good central location with an amazing view of a local park. The room was clean and the apartment was near amazing places to eat. 
Would gladly stay here again. 

Thank you!

Un Apartamento, situado en un barrio hermoso SEGURO, donde caminar y trasladarse a dos shoppings cercanos es un paseo pese al calor que pase (37C).Tiene todas las comodidades pertinentes de acuerdo a su precio, y sin duda volvería a rentarlo.
Su dueño es una persona amable , educada con buen entendimiento y resolución de cualquier problema que sobrevenga.Insisto el barrio hace la diferencia, está muy bien servido en comercios, y sobretodo seguridad.
Hermoso el departamento y el servicio 5 estrellas, sin duda regreso a ese departamento.

Este aparta es 100% recomendado. La ubicación es perfecta para moverse en la ciudad y la zona en la que está es super linda, con muchos restaurantes para comer. El aparta en sí es precioso, me sentí como en casa, cuenta con todas las comodidades para hacer vida normal mientras que paseamos: cocina completa, el baño bien equipado, la sala es super cozy y la vista desde el balcón es preciosa.
Nicolas y Rocío son super buenos anfitriones, muy atentos a lo que necesites y a responder tus preguntas. Hagan caso de los lugares que recomiendan para comer o visitar porque son buenísimos!
El departamento estaba impecable, tal como figuraba en el anuncio. La decoración del departamento es muy acogedora y la ubicación excelente.

Mi marido (suizo) y yo pasamos casi un mes alli. Lindo y calido departamento, muy bien decorado. Excelente ubicacion. Bellisima vista especialmente para disfrutar los atardeceres desde la terraza. Rocio ha sido una atenta y super cordial anfitriona y para nada entrometida!
Una mencion especial para Fausto, el encargado del edificio, siempre bien predispuesto para todo, siempre sonriente e impecable. Un gusto verlo diariamente!

Estuvimos en el apartamento de Rocío y Nicolás durante 4 días.
El apartamento es exactamente como se muestra en las fotos. Las vistas desde el apartamento y la piscina son espectaculares. Es fundamental que tenga aire acondicionado, ya que los días y las noches fueron muy calurosas.
Hay un conserje muy dispuesto y los vecinos muy serviciales. 
Rocío y Nicolás nos dieron muy buenos consejos sobre lugares para visitar y para comer. 
Estuvimos muy agusto. Totalmente recomendado!

Rocio y Nicolás tienen una casa espectacular!! es exactamente a como la describen o hasta mejor!! su tiempo de respuesta es inmediato y están muy atentos para cualquier cosa que se precise !!Excellent place to enjoy Buenos Aires!! Good location, safety and nice. Recommendable !!
La experiencia ha sido muy buena. El departamento es bastante amplio y cómodo y muy bien arreglado. Tiene todo lo que uno puede necesitar. Además está bien ubicado.

La experiencia con Rocio y Nicolas fue excelente. La comunicacion fue clara desde el principio y fueron muy amables dejandonos entrar antes y salir mas tarde del horario de check out.
El apartamento es tal cual en las fotos. La vista al parque es unica y la ubicacion es ideal ya que es super central y con acceso rapido a subte y a los mejores barrios de buenos Aires.
Recomiendo este apartamento a cualquier persona que busca estar en un lugar lindo, calido, seguro y bien ubicado.
Muchas gracias chicos por su gentileza y hospedarnos en tan acogedor apartamento.

Pasamos unos dìas en el departamento de Rocio & Nicolas, està ubicado en una de las màs lindas zonas de la Capital, desde el balcòn se ve el parco Las Heras, el departamento es muy lindo, muy limpio y bien equipajado, te sentìs como en casa tuya, se puede disfrutar tambièn de una hermosa terraza en el ùltimo piso con pileta. No lleguè a conocer a Rocio y Nicolas pero fueron muy amables y atentos,y siempre presentes con los mensajes. gracias de todo!
Fantastic flat in a great location. Highly recommend the hosts too.
Love the view , the location , the hostess and the book shelf!

Beau petit logement, quoique assez bruyant avec les voitures/bus de Las Heras et un party dans un édifice environnant. Nous n'avons pas eu la chance de rencontrer Rocio et Nicolas mais ils étaient facilement accessible via Airbnb.
Everything was fantastic! highly recommended!

Rocio and Nicolas were very kind and welcoming and always reachable. The place is as shown in the pictures, has a nice balcony and view and is very well located and connected. We would recommend it to anyone!

Host were really nice and welcoming, even send us a list of places to go near the flat which is in a great neighborhood and the view from the balcony is perfect at sunset. I would definitely recommend ppl to stay here!

La estadía fue excelente, los anfitriones fueron muy atentos con nosotros, estuvieron a horario y ofrecieron todas las comodidades solicitadas, hasta recomendaciones sobre lugares a visitar.
El dpto es único, moderno y muy cuidado, con un diseño espectacular, amplio. Está muy bien ubicado, con varias líneas de colectivos en la puerta y a 4 cuadras de un gran mall (Alto Palermo). La zona es segura. Totalmente recomendado para estadías largas o cortas!!

Excelente departamento, fuimos 4 personas y nos sentimos muy cómodos. Tal cual lo describen las fotos. La zona está muy bien, hay negocios a metros del edificio. La atención de los dueños fue excelente, muy atentos a toda hora.

Desde la llegada al dpto hasta la salida del dpto, todo fue perfecto. El Dpto confortable, tal cual lo ofrecido, excelente el equipamiento. La anfitriona Rocio, mejor no nos podría haber tocado. Esperamos encontrar lugar para próximas reservas. ALTAMENTE RECOMENDABLE!!!

Rocio & Nicolas was very kind and professional, the apartment was clean nice and everything was perfect I highly recommend if you choose Buenos Aires as your destination. this apartment have to be your option.
Thanks Rocio and hope to stay in this beauty again.


Adolfo & Karina

Recomiendo este departamento al 100%. Tiene una excelente ubicación, excelentes comodidades y por sobre todo excelente atención por parte de sus dueños. 
Gracias por toda la atención chicos =)

Amazing view! Perfect location! Great hosts! We had a perfect stay at Rocio and Nicolas´s apartment. The place has everything (and more!) that you might need when you visit Buenos Aires. The building is located in a very lively neighborhood, with a stunning park just in front. The hosts are an easy-going couple, very kind and well predisposed. I strongly recommend this place and have no doubts that I will stay here everytime I need to visit B.A.
Wonderful views, very comfortable bed and a fantastic shower! Great place to stay in the city
This truly was a fantastic location! Clean, conveniently located and the hosts were very very responsive! Our stay in Buenos Aires was fantastic! Definitely recommend!

Rocio & Nicolas's apartment was a fantastic place to stay in a great city.  The apartment is even better than it looks in the photos and they are wonderful hosts.  They provided terrific local tips and were very flexible when I asked to check in a little early.  I also had a few follow up questions which were responded to almost instantly.  If I travel to BA again I will hope to stay in this wonderful apartment.

Fantastic apartment in a beautiful, central part of the city. Apartment is clean and comfortable and the hosts were incredibly helpful with heaps of tips and advice about the city. They answered questions quickly and were flexible - such fantastic hosts. 
View from the balcony is a beauty. Straight over the park!
Thanks guys!

This is a fantastic apartment for a holiday in BA.  The location is great and Rocio and Nicolas provided excellent advice on local restaurants and sites.  We bought one SUBE card between us and used this to travel all over the cities on buses and subways.  The apartment has a wonderful view of the park (although if you open the sliding door to the balcony you will realise there is a busy 8 lane road right there so sitting on the deck is noisy) and it gets lovely sun in the bedroom in the morning and the living area in the afternoon.  The facilities are excellent - bathroom, kitchen, fridge/freezer, two heat pumps, roof pool, doorman, elevator.  Highly recommended and we hope to return.  We did not meet rocio and nicolas but we really appreciated their regular correspondence - it made us feel connected.  Fausto, the doorman, let us in and was very friendly but we had no Spanish to talk to him.

My husband and I stayed at Rocio and Nicolas's place in January.  We loved the size of this apartment.  Their AC worked great (we visited in the summer and noticed not all buildings/apartments have good AC units), it really cooled down the entire place perfectly.  The bathroom amenities were very nice and look new.  The kitchen was well equipped.  They have wi-fi, responded quickly every time i needed them.  We also really really loved the location!  It's so pretty (a pretty, green park across the street to picnic at and people-watch!) and location is very efficient  (lots of taxis, restaurants and things-to-do in the area).  They were also so kind in allowing us a really late check-out since we didn't fly out until nighttime. I would definitely recommend this place if you're looking to visit Buenos Aires!!!

Rocio and Nicolas’s apartment was as advertised - centrally located in a nice neighborhood with a beautiful view of a lush park across the street. They were also great hosts, accommodating a few requests we had and always responding very quickly. They also had some helpful recommendations for restaurants and sightseeing. We enjoyed walking to the Cementerio de la Recoleta, the Museo Nacional de Bellas Artes, and Parque 3 de Febrero. MALBA was also great. We highly recommend this apartment for your stay in Buenos Aires!

Desde a estruta do apartamento até a atenção que nos foi dada, passando pela localização maravilhosa... foi tudo excelente. Rocio é uma anfitriã maravilhosa e muito atenciosa. Tivemos um problema serio com o carro (pois fomos dirigindo desde o Brasil) e tanto ela quanto o Nicolas fizeram todo possivel para nos ajudar, inclusive encontram um excelente mecanico que também foi muito atencioso. Alem disso, nos ajudaram com esse problema do carro mesmo depois do nosso check-out, quando não tinham mais obrigação nenhuma conosco. Apesar do estresse que tivemos com o carro, a nossa estada no apartamento foi maravilhosa do começo ao fim. Super indicamos!!

We loved staying at this apartment for three days. The space was very comfortable and the view of the park through the huge front window was beautiful. It was easy to visit all the places we wanted to go by bus or train ((SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Maps was great for schedules and directions.) The neighborhood was safe for walking around at night and there were restaurants and cafes close by. Loved it!
Rocio and Nicolas have an amazing place. They were so helpful and gave us tips to the best parts of the City. Fantastic hosts and wicked apartment

Ideally located and well equipped apartment within the Palermo district of Buenos Aires, close to the Recoletta area. 

Rocio and Nicolas were very helpful suggesting restaurants to try and helped arranged our taxi to the airport.  They also facilitated an early check in so we could drop our bags off.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend Rocio and Nicolas's apartment!
great stay! Communication and response time was top notch! The reccs they sent us were all fantastic as well!
Truly the best place to stay in Buenos Aires! Amazing location, apartment, view, and hosts! I'd certainly stay here again when in BA next.

Rocio and Nicolas were great hosts during our stay in Buenos Aires. They were very communicative in advance of our check-in, provided great recommendations of things to do in the neighborhood and were very attentive during our stay. The apartment itself was exactly as advertised and suited our needs perfectly. We would highly recommend both them and the apartment!
Amazing place, central location, super communicative helpful and friendly hosts. 100% would recommend

This is a fabulous location, a quick walk to great restaurants and shops - and all Palermo Soho has to offer. The best part is the show the green parrots gave us every morning from Parque Las Heras! The apartment is at the perfect vantage point to make it like an aviary when you are sitting on the balcony or inside. Rocio and Nicolas were wonderful hosts - very quick and easy to communicate with...and they helped us when we couldn't open the safe. Thank you again for everything, Rocio and Nicolas!

What friendly and accommodating hosts Rocio and Nicolás are! Especially when we were really late arriving, Rocio still met us with a smile and all the information we needed to enjoy the area. It's a great location between Palermo and Recoleta, with buses to almost everywhere it seems stopping right outside ((SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) maps is really good for helping you know what bus to catch btw).
The one thing small disappointment fir us was the pool wasn't usable when we stayed - it was empty and I don't know why. This is out of the host's control of course, just if it is important to you, you might want to ask about it beforehand.

The flat is well-located, public transportation wise, and it has a beautiful view of the park across the street, and the Buenos Aires skyline, from the living-room window. Rocio & Nicolás were readily available via email, and super friendly at that, but the flat showed signs that they had not carefully checked its state for a while. There was a lack of in-depth cleaning evidenced in the bathroom and kitchen, and a noisy running toilet that should have been fixed prior to my arrival. As a consequence of these unattended details, I found the costof my stay too expensive.
Great location, comfortable bed, and very kind, responsive hosts.  On top of that, it has a great view!  I would love to stay here again.

This is an amazing place to stay in Buenos Aires! The apartment is clean and spacious - just what was needed after a long flight! The location is perfect - easy to get downtown on the metro, and walking distance to the wonderful bars and restaurants of Palermo. Also a short walk from Palermo Park. Advice from Rocio & Nicholas about where to eat and what to see was very helpful
Great place!

If you're thinking of coming to Buenos Aires and you want to stay in a really trendy hip and happening area then this is the place that you need to look any further just booked this and you will be extremely happy. Make sure to go to Bullets beer and brewery, just a short 20 minute walk up Aveneda de las Heras on Junin and also make sure that you check out the cemetery/Mausoleum on Junin.
Good location
This is a great place in a wonderful location.

Rocio and Nicolas's apartment was so beautiful and could not have been better located - right in front of the park with amazing restaurants and bars near by and in perfect walking distance from Palermo viejo etc. check in and out was seamless, they even sent me a list of suggestions for things to do, places to shop, and restaurants and bars on their own. I highly recommend this spacious, sunny, beautiful apartment.

Probably really "the best place to stay in BsAs". We loved it. They were super friendly and helpful and gave us nice tips. The apartment is perfect. Nothing to add. Just come and see yourself! You wont regret it.

Rocio and Nicolas's place is the perfect Buenos Aires spot! The neighborhood is ideal, with all the sights a short cab ride or walk away and lots of things to do within a few blocks too. The views are beautiful and the apartment has everything you need for a comfortable stay - the water pressure in the shower is especially great. The kitchen has everything you need for cooking and coffee. It can be noisy at night but that is part of living in a big city. Rocio and Nicolas were responsive and accommodating, offering tons of fantastic recommendations and being super flexible with issues with check in and check out. We highly recommend this apartment for a Buenos Aires stay!

Yes it IS the best place to live in Buenos Aires!

Spent 10 days at the apartment. Scheduling and payment with AirBnb was flawless. Rico and Nicolas are very proactive on email and responded to every question!

Our check in was a snap as well at the building which does have security. Really the whole neighberhood was lovely and we walked around at almost all hours. There is plenty to eat or buy very close to the apartment so pretty much anything you need is in a few blocks. We also used Uber in the city which worked very well.

The apartment is bright and lovely. We found it neat as a pin! It has pretty much everything you need except for a washer and dryer but there are coin laundries around.

The apartment overlooks the park (which like most of the parks in BA is under restoration) and Las Herras street can give you some road and traffic noises but that never really bothered me.

If you stay in BA this should certainly be an apartment on your list! Recommended!!!

Great spot! The apartment itself is perfect for two people with a good sized kitchen, living area, bathroom and bedroom. Plus a balcony overlooking Parque Las Heras. The location is great with tons of restaurants and cafes within walking distance and Rocio and Nicolas supplied us with recommendations in the area. The apartment was also within walking distance of some great parks in Palermo, the fine arts museum, and many other sights! Check in and check out were very easy and Rocio and Nicolas were helpful when we got in earlier than check in time and needed to store our luggage before our flight. The place was clean, safe, and homey. We really enjoyed our stay here and would highly recommend it to anyone traveling to Buenos Aires!!

The apartment was exactly how the pictures looked! Everything about this place is perfect!!!!! I loved my stay and look forward staying there again in the future! It is in a safe part of city, surrounded by tons of delicious restaurants and bakeries. The bed is very comfortable and the shower was amazing, finding hot showers with water pressure is a challenge in South America. Rocio and Nicolas are great hosts willing to answer any questions. This is your best choice for your time in Buenos Aires!
Amazing flat, Carmen was amazing

Great place and great hosts
good communication

Amazing apartment with a great balcony overlooking the park. Rocio and Nicolas are very kind hosts and provided us with a list of places in the area to try. You are also close to all the action in Palermo. Highly recommended!

Beautiful flat and in a very convenient location. Rocio and Nicolas were very quick to reply to our queries and kept in regular contact with us. Excellent for exploring Buenos Aires. Good access to restaurants, tube and shops.
Great place to stay in trendy BA. Then apartment provided everything Rocio and Nicolas indicated. For those on their first visit taxi rates are unbelievably low and make getting around so easy.
Perfect place for a quick stay!  Great locale, clean and has everything you need!

Rocio & Nicolas are communicative and helpful. In addition to having a great view their apartment has some key ingredients: a comfortable bed; a good shower and it's well located. The subte (metro) is within comfortable walking distance. Locally there are some great cultural and historical places to visit (e.g. MALBA).
Very convenient location for exploring BA.

Very nice place in a really convenient area.
Park is right in front and view from balcony is nice.
Very kind and supportive host.
We would like to come back again.
Really good place. 100% recommended

Rocio & Nicolas's place is a fabulous, modern apartment in the most convenient location in Palermo overlooking a beautiful park. The kitchen area provides excellent cooking and dining space, and the bedroom & bathroom give a couple ample room. We loved staying here and would definitely come again!

Rocio and nicolas were an absolute pleasure and they were fantastic hosts! The apartment was clean and very nice with a perfect location and beautiful view! Restaurants and bars very close as well as supermarkets which we used as well. Rocio and nicolas provided us with alot of information about the city and recommendations which came in handy. We would definitely stay here again.

Great place to stay. Close to everything. Near large dog park. AND THEY HAVE HOT WATER! My daughter was in a different part of town and her place didn't have hot water in the kitchen or bathroom, so we definitely were happy that we had it! Rocio & Nicolas were great hosts! Super helpful, nice, and communicated promptly. Definitely would stay again :)
Muito bacana, bem localizado. Os hosts sempre atenciosos
Det var en super fin lejlighed.

Book this place! It's a great location and there is soooo much to see and do in the area. It's easy to get to the incredible parks and Rocio and Nicolas are super helpful with loads of great advice on the area and generally Buenos Aires! Wish we really did live here!
